Description:
This video features a discussion at Microsoft Ignite with Rajesh Ramachandran from ABB, focusing on how ABB leverages generative and agentic AI to improve industrial operations. The conversation highlights real-world examples, such as a large solar plant managed with minimal human intervention, and outlines ABB's priorities in scaling AI value, optimizing business processes, and empowering employees.

#Microsoft #MicrosoftCloud
Title: The New Industrialists | ABB leveraging generative and agentic AI to improve industrial operations
Author: Microsoft Cloud
